description: Jean Randall Stevens, 66, of Billings (Miles City) went to rest on Jan. 27, 2018. She passed away at home with many family members and friends during her final hours. She was a constant fighter...
title: Jean R. Stevens
maintext:
Jean Randall Stevens, 66, of Billings (Miles City) went to rest on Jan. 27, 2018. She passed away at home with many family members and friends during her final hours. She was a constant fighter and always surprised everyone with her smile and laughter.
She is survived by her husband, Dan Stevens; her four kids, Sherman Kirby, Chad Kirby, Jarrett Kirby, and Justin Stevens; additionally many grandkids and friends. A reflection of her life will be held at Dahl Funeral Chapel at 10 Yellowstone Ave, Billings, on Monday, Feb. 5, at 11 a.m., with burial services following at Mountview Cemetery, then a luncheon afterwards again at Dahl Funeral Chapel. In lieu of flowers please send memorials to a charity of oneâ€™s choice. Memories may be shared at www.dahlfuneralchapel.com.
